Caption: Sobek, receiving.
Name: Annoucement_4

Caption: You called, Sobek answers.
Name: Annoucement_2

Caption: Sobek's here, what the situation?

Caption: Sobek, standing by.
Name: Annoucement_3

Caption: NARC deployed.
Name: MarkedTargetWithNarc_3

Caption: Target has a NARC, they're wide open.

Name: MarkedTargetWithNarc_2

Caption: They're not getting out of my sight, TAG engaged.
Name: MarkedTargetWithTag_2

Caption: TAG's lasing target.
Name: MarkedTargetWithTag_1

Name: MarkedTargetWithTag_3

Name: FiringAtTargetMarkedWithNarc_2

Name: FiringAtTargetMarkedWithTag_3

Caption: Lased target found, eliminating!
Name: FiringAtTargetMarkedWithTag_2

Caption: White crisp sheets as far as the eye can see…
Name: Arctic_1

Caption: Here comes the snow.
Name: Arctic_3

Caption: Beautiful, isn't it? Too bad we've got to burn it all.
Name: Arctic_4

Caption: If there's one thing I like about winter, it's that you'll have a harder time running hot.
Name: Arctic_2

Caption: Joints are acting up, I suggest we get moving before we become part of the scenery.
Name: Glacial_2

Caption: I really like snow, but this is a bit too much for me.
Name: Glacial_1

Caption: If there's one thing I like about winter, it's that you'll have a harder time running hot.
Name: Arctic_2

Caption: Cold, so cold… wait, is that you on my sensor, Commander?
Name: Glacial_3

Caption: Heard a few stories about bounty hunters in places like this, it never goes peacefully.
Name: Canyon_1

Caption: They say dragons live in canyons like this, waiting for tourists or Battlemechs to devour.
Name: Canyon_2

Caption: Hot and dangerous? Nobody told me we were operating in Canopus territory.
Name: Summer_3

Caption: Tallala has a rough time navigating places like this, but once she's in a sweet spot… it'll be a lightshow.
Name: Lush_2

Caption: A rocky maze covered in vegetation is a wonderful site… and a helo's worse nightmare.
Name: Lush_1

Caption: Watch out for landslides, gravity and huge rocks do more damage than autocannons in some situations.
Name: Lush_3

Caption: Nice, boring and simple… What? There's more to say about this place? I can't fit them into spoken words then.
Name: Earthlike_1

Caption: Just us, the desert, and a showdown on the horizon. Exhilarating!
Name: Desert_1

Caption: Why are we here? Why the hell are we here?
Name: Forest_3

Caption: People say this is pretty, I say this is a waiting nightmare.
Name: Forest_2

Caption: There's too many angles to get attacked from. I hope we have a flamer.
Name: Forest_1

Caption: I thought I said no forests, Commander. I said it precisely.
Name: Forest_4

Caption: If I space out… I'm really sorry.
Name: Autumn_4

Caption: This isn't on the contract, but I'll do it for the money… I guess.
Name: Autumn_1

Caption: Can you guys hear them? I- Nevermind, pretend I didn't say anything.
Name: Autumn_3

Caption: I… I don't want to be here.
Name: Autumn_2

Caption: Triton, I hope I buried you guys well… please.
Name: Summer_2

Caption: My body's telling me to relax, drink a lager, but my mind's telling me to get hell out of here.
Name: Summer_1

Caption: Hot and dangerous? Nobody told me we were operating in Canopus territory.
Name: Summer_3

Caption: I'm focusing on the snow. Only the snow.
Name: Winter_1

Caption: If there's one thing I like about winter, it's that you'll have a harder time running hot.
Name: Arctic_2

Caption: The frost on the leaves… like tears in the sun when it melts.
Name: Winter_2

Caption: Snow and foliage, you can hide an entire lance here and get the drop on someone. I would know.
Name: Winter_3

Caption: These kinds of places teach you to kill well, else you're ejecting into an early grave.
Name: Hostile_3

Caption: No civilians, no ambiguity. Let's go wild.
Name: Hostile_2

Caption: Living life on the edge, huh?  I like it.
Name: Hostile_1

Caption: Nice and quiet, always wanted to rent out a habitat here to write peacefully.
Name: Moon_1

Caption: A man once sat on a dead thing like this, discovered the whole damn universe in a matter of minutes.
Name: Moon_2

Caption: *cough* Oh man, that's not good for my luns. *cough*
Name: Sulfurous_2

Caption: How do people even live here? Do they have LosTech we can approriate? Let's just get moving.
Name: Sulfurous_1

Caption: Any place that can overheat your 'Mech in seconds is a death trap. Don't get disabled out here.
Name: Volcanic_1

Caption: Has… has anyone seen my crocodile? Anyone?
Name: Mission.Intro_4

Caption: This will be a good story to write.
Name: Mission.Intro_3

Caption: Get psyched, everyone!
Name: Mission.Intro_1

Caption: I feel a pageturner coming up for this op.
Name: Mission.Intro_2

Caption: Knew you had a good eye, glad to see we're on the same side of the coin.
